at least 2,000 years old

the entity loses 1D20 hit points per dose

What types of beings are affected by the powder?
extraterrestrial and other planar beings

What would happen if the powder was used against a shoggoth or a deep one?
it would be useless

1D3 hit points

What happens to the victim on the third round?
The victim bursts into flames, losing 1D10 hit points then and each round thereafter.

What is the effect of the stench of burning hair and flesh?
The stench of burning hair and flesh is overwhelming, requiring all witnesses to make SAN rolls or lose 1/1D6 SAN.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is it possible to render aid to the victim?
It is impossible to render aid, since the horrified victim burns from the inside out.

What are some alternative names for this event?
Alternative names: Ye Dreadful Pricking, The Curse of Fiery Doom, Cthugha’s Embrace.

What is the effect on witnesses who fail to make SAN rolls?
Witnesses who fail to make SAN rolls lose 1/1D6 SAN.

What is the duration of the spell?
7 days

How does the caster cast the spell?
The caster must possess a piece of the victim

What is the effect of the spell on the victim on the second day?
A 4 hit point wound

Consumed in a ball of flame

The wound size increases by 2 hit points each day.

What happens to the target's Sanity each day?
An equal amount of Sanity is lost each day.

The victim's body is consumed in a ball of flame.

What is required for the spell Dominate to take effect?
The caster must succeed in an opposed POW roll with the target.
